metadata.title: CVE-2024-32487 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: less through 653 allows OS command execution via a newline character in thename of a file, because quoting is mishandled in filename.c. Exploitationtypically requires use with attacker-controlled file names, such as thefiles extracted from an untrusted archive. Exploitation also requires theLESSOPEN environment variable, but this is set by default in many commoncases.

criterions.comment: less package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
